tables.name: cosmos_chains_registry
tables.description: This table provides a registry of Cosmos ecosystem blockchain chains, including their status and network type. The data is used to track and monitor the current state of various Cosmos-based blockchains.

columns.name: chain_name
columns.description: The name of the blockchain chain.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the blockchain chain.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the blockchain chain, such as active or inactive.

columns.name: network_type
columns.description: The type of network used by the blockchain chain, such as Tendermint or Cosmos-SDK.

columns.name: bech32_prefix
columns.description: The Bech32 prefix used by the blockchain chain for addressing and transactions.

columns.name: github_repo
columns.description: The GitHub repository URL associated with the blockchain chain.

columns.name: last_refresh
columns.description: The date and time when the data was last updated or refreshed.

columns.name: ingestion_date
columns.description: The date and time when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: cosmwasm_github_analysis
tables.description: This table provides an analysis of GitHub repositories that utilize CosmWasm smart contracts, offering insights into their performance and usage metrics.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month in which the repository was analyzed, represented as a number (1-12).

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The GitHub username or organization that owns the repository.

columns.name: repo_name
columns.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

columns.name: file_path
columns.description: The path to the CosmWasm smart contract file within the repository.

columns.name: stars
columns.description: The number of stars the repository has received on GitHub.

columns.name: watchers
columns.description: The number of users watching the repository on GitHub.

columns.name: forks
columns.description: The number of times the repository has been forked on GitHub.

columns.name: cosmwasm
columns.description: The presence or absence of a CosmWasm smart contract in the repository (True/False value).

tables.name: cosmwasm_penetration_analysis
tables.description: This table provides a cosmwasm penetration analysis, offering insights into the deployment and instantiation activity across the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers a daily snapshot of economic impact and growth within the ecosystem.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date when the data was recorded. It represents a specific day in the Cosmos blockchain timeline.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain chain, used to differentiate between various chains in the ecosystem.

columns.name: day_deployments
columns.description: The total number of cosmwasm deployments that occurred on a specific day. This metric helps track the activity level of developers and the adoption rate of cosmwasm within the ecosystem.

columns.name: day_instantiations
columns.description: The total number of cosmwasm instantiations that occurred on a specific day. This metric provides insights into the utilization and growth of cosmwasm-based applications within the ecosystem.

columns.name: economic_impact
columns.description: A metric representing the economic impact of cosmwasm activity on a specific day. This could include revenue generated, tokens transferred, or other relevant economic indicators.

tables.name: cosmwasm_traffic_analysis
tables.description: This table provides a high-level overview of CosmWasm smart contract traffic on the Cosmos blockchain network. It offers insights into the number of transactions, function calls, and fees associated with these contracts.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Timestamp for when the data was recorded, in ISO 8601 format

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: contract
columns.description: Address of the CosmWasm smart contract

columns.name: n_txns
columns.description: Total number of transactions involving the CosmWasm smart contract

columns.name: n_calls
columns.description: Total number of function calls made by the CosmWasm smart contract

columns.name: fee_amount
columns.description: Total fee amount incurred by the CosmWasm smart contract

tables.name: cosmwasm_users_analysis
tables.description: This table provides an analysis of user behavior on the Cosmos blockchain, specifically focusing on CosmWasm smart contracts. It offers insights into user activity, helping to understand the ecosystem's growth and adoption.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date of the transaction, represented in a standardized format (YYYY-MM-DD).

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the user who initiated the transaction.
